actions.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution authorizing the Secretary of the Senate to pay certain expenses incurred in connection with the funeral of the Honorable John Tower, late a Senator from the State of Texas.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Senate to pay, from the contingent fund of the Senate, the actual and necessary expenses incurred by the Senate representatives who attended the funeral of the Honorable John Tower.

titles.title: A resolution authorizing the Secretary of the Senate to pay certain expenses incurred in connection with the funeral of the Honorable John Tower, late a Senator from the State of Texas.
